name: Practive
description: Practive is a cloud-based office management platform designed for accounting firms and CAs, featuring an AI-powered WhatsApp chatbot, automated task and invoice generation, smart reminders, invoicing with client ledger tracking, document and DSC management, team access control, multi-entity billing, advanced dashboard attendance tracking, custom reporting, and secure client portal access. It streamlines workflows, improves accountability, and keeps practices organised.
focus_areas: Office Management Software for Chartered Accountants
